long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color Picker Lite: Your Essential Tool for Quick Color Capture

Features:
• Instantly pick colors from any webpage
• Get HEX and RGB values with a single click
• Easy-to-use interface with a crosshair cursor
• Automatically copy selected colors to your clipboard

Perfect for web designers, developers, and digital artists, Color Picker Lite streamlines your workflow by providing accurate color information right in your browser. Whether you're matching colors for web design, grabbing inspiration from images, or fine-tuning your projects, our lightweight extension has you covered.
